description: The ability to listen to and understand information and ideas presented through spoken words and sentences.
description_nb: Evnen til å lytte til og forstå informasjon og ideer presentert gjennom tale.

description: The ability to read and understand information and ideas presented in writing.
description_nb: Evnen til å lese og forstå informasjon og ideer presentert skriftlig.

description: The ability to communicate information and ideas in speaking so others will understand.
description_nb: Muntlig uttrykkelse handler om å forklare ideer og informasjon på en måte som andre forstår

description: The ability to communicate information and ideas in writing so others will understand.
description_nb: Skriftlig uttrykkelse handler om å formidle ideer og informasjon klart gjennom tekst

description: The ability to come up with a number of ideas about a topic (the number of ideas is important, not their quality, correctness, or creativity).
description_nb: Idémyldring handler om å komme på mange ideer rundt et tema, uten at kvaliteten på ideene er det viktigste

description: The ability to come up with unusual or clever ideas about a given topic or situation, or to develop creative ways to solve a problem.
description_nb: Originalitet handler om å finne nye og smarte måter å løse problemer eller utvikle ideer på

description: The ability to tell when something is wrong or is likely to go wrong. It does not involve solving the problem, only recognizing there is a problem.
description_nb: Evnen til å se problemer handler om å oppdage når noe kan gå galt, uten nødvendigvis å løse det

description: The ability to apply general rules to specific problems to produce answers that make sense.
description_nb: Evnen til å resonnere handler om å bruke regler for å finne løsninger på spesifikke problemer

description: The ability to combine pieces of information to form general rules or conclusions (includes finding a relationship among seemingly unrelated events).
description_nb: Induktiv resonnering handler om å finne sammenhenger og lage regler basert på ulike deler av informasjon

description: The ability to arrange things or actions in a certain order or pattern according to a specific rule or set of rules (e.g., patterns of numbers, letters, words, pictures, mathematical operations).
description_nb: Å organisere informasjon handler om å sette ting i riktig rekkefølge eller følge et bestemt mønster

description: The ability to generate or use different sets of rules for combining or grouping things in different ways.
description_nb: Kategorifleksibilitet handler om å gruppere ting på ulike måter ved hjelp av forskjellige regler

description: The ability to choose the right mathematical methods or formulas to solve a problem.
description_nb: Matematisk resonnering handler om å bruke riktige metoder eller formler for å løse problemer

description: The ability to add, subtract, multiply, or divide quickly and correctly.
description_nb: Tallforståelse handler om å regne raskt og riktig med pluss, minus, gange og deling

description: The ability to remember information such as words, numbers, pictures, and procedures.
description_nb: Hukommelse handler om å huske informasjon som ord, tall, bilder eller oppgaver

description: The ability to quickly make sense of, combine, and organize information into meaningful patterns.
description_nb: Informasjonsorganisering handler om å raskt forstå og sette sammen informasjon til tydelige mønstre

description: The ability to identify or detect a known pattern (a figure, object, word, or sound) that is hidden in other distracting material.
description_nb: Mønster­gjenkjenning handler om å finne skjulte mønstre i tall, ord, bilder eller lyder

description: The ability to quickly and accurately compare similarities and differences among sets of letters, numbers, objects, pictures, or patterns. The things to be compared may be presented at the same time or one after the other. This ability also includes comparing a presented object with a remembered object.
description_nb: Oppfatningsevne handler om raskt å se likheter og forskjeller i bokstaver, tall, bilder eller mønstre

description: The ability to know your location in relation to the environment or to know where other objects are in relation to you.
description_nb: Romforståelse handler om å vite hvor du er i forhold til omgivelsene og hvordan ting er plassert rundt deg

description: The ability to imagine how something will look after it is moved around or when its parts are moved or rearranged.
description_nb: Visualisering handler om å forestille seg hvordan noe ser ut når det flyttes eller endres

description: The ability to concentrate on a task over a period of time without being distracted.
description_nb: Dyp konsentrasjon handler om å holde fokus på en oppgave uten å bli distrahert

description: The ability to shift back and forth between two or more activities or sources of information (such as speech, sounds, touch, or other sources).
description_nb: Tidsfordeling handler om å bytte raskt mellom flere oppgaver eller informasjonskilder

description: The ability to keep your hand and arm steady while moving your arm or while holding your arm and hand in one position.
description_nb: Stødighet i arm og hånd handler om å holde hånden rolig, enten i bevegelse eller i en fast posisjon

description: The ability to quickly move your hand, your hand together with your arm, or your two hands to grasp, manipulate, or assemble objects.
description_nb: Rask armbevegelse handler om å bruke hendene raskt og effektivt for å gripe eller håndtere ting

description: The ability to make precisely coordinated movements of the fingers of one or both hands to grasp, manipulate, or assemble very small objects.
description_nb: Fingernemhet handler om å bruke fingrene til presise bevegelser, som å gripe eller håndtere små objekter

description: The ability to quickly and repeatedly adjust the controls of a machine or a vehicle to exact positions.
description_nb: Presisjon betyr å justere noe nøyaktig, for eksempel kontrollene på en maskin eller et kjøretøy

description: The ability to coordinate two or more limbs (for example, two arms, two legs, or one leg and one arm) while sitting, standing, or lying down. It does not involve performing the activities while the whole body is in motion.
description_nb: Kroppskoordinasjon handler om å bruke flere kroppsdeler samtidig, som armer og bein, mens du sitter, står eller ligger

description: The ability to choose quickly between two or more movements in response to two or more different signals (lights, sounds, pictures). It includes the speed with which the correct response is started with the hand, foot, or other body part.
description_nb: Responsorientering betyr å raskt velge riktig bevegelse basert på signaler som lys, lyd eller bilder

description: The ability to time your movements or the movement of a piece of equipment in anticipation of changes in the speed and/or direction of a moving object or scene.
description_nb: Fartsberegning handler om å vurdere hvordan hastighet og retning endrer seg for et objekt i bevegelse

description: The ability to quickly respond (with the hand, finger, or foot) to a signal (sound, light, picture) when it appears.
description_nb: Reaksjonstid handler om hvor raskt du kan reagere på signaler som lyd, lys eller bilder

description: The ability to make fast, simple, repeated movements of the fingers, hands, and wrists.
description_nb: Hastighet i håndledd og fingre betyr å gjøre raske og gjentatte bevegelser med hendene

description: The ability to quickly move the arms and legs.
description_nb: Hurtighet handler om å bevege armer og bein raskt

description: The ability to exert maximum muscle force to lift, push, pull, or carry objects.
description_nb: Fysisk styrke betyr å bruke musklene til å løfte, skyve eller bære tunge ting

description: The ability to use short bursts of muscle force to propel oneself (as in jumping or sprinting), or to throw an object.
description_nb: Eksplosiv styrke handler om å bruke mye kraft på kort tid, for eksempel ved hopping eller sprinting

description: The ability to exert muscle force repeatedly or continuously over time. This involves muscular endurance and resistance to muscle fatigue.
description_nb: Dynamisk styrke handler om å bruke musklene gjentatte ganger eller over lengre tid uten å bli sliten

description: The ability to use your abdominal and lower back muscles to support part of the body repeatedly or continuously over time without 'giving out' or fatiguing.
description_nb: Kjernestyrke betyr å bruke mage- og ryggmusklene til å støtte kroppen i ulike bevegelser over tid

description: The ability to exert yourself physically over long periods of time without getting winded or out of breath.
description_nb: Fysisk utholdenhet handler om å holde ut fysisk aktivitet over lang tid uten å bli utmattet

description: The ability to bend, stretch, twist, or reach with your body, arms, and/or legs.
description_nb: Utstrekningsfleksibilitet betyr evnen til å bøye, strekke eller nå noe med kroppen, armer eller ben

description: The ability to quickly and repeatedly bend, stretch, twist, or reach out with your body, arms, and/or legs.
description_nb: Dynamisk fleksibilitet handler om raskt å kunne bøye, strekke eller vri kroppen flere ganger etter hverandre

description: The ability to coordinate the movement of your arms, legs, and torso together when the whole body is in motion.
description_nb: Kroppskoordinering handler om å bruke armer, ben og overkropp sammen når hele kroppen er i bevegelse

description: The ability to keep or regain your body balance or stay upright when in an unstable position.
description_nb: Balanse betyr å holde kroppen stabil eller stå oppreist, selv i ustabile situasjoner

description: The ability to see details at close range (within a few feet of the observer).
description_nb: Nærsyn handler om å se detaljer tydelig på kort avstand

description: The ability to see details at a distance.
description_nb: Langsyn betyr å kunne se detaljer tydelig på lang avstand

description: The ability to match or detect differences between colors, including shades of color and brightness.
description_nb: Fargesyn handler om å oppdage forskjeller og likheter mellom farger, nyanser og styrke

description: The ability to see under low light conditions.
description_nb: Nattsyn handler om å se godt under dårlige lysforhold

description: The ability to see objects or movement of objects to one's side when the eyes are looking ahead.
description_nb: Sidesyn betyr å se ting eller bevegelser ved siden av deg uten å flytte blikket

description: The ability to judge which of several objects is closer or farther away from you, or to judge the distance between you and an object.
description_nb: Dybdesyn handler om å bedømme avstanden mellom deg og andre ting, eller hvilken ting som er nærmest eller lengst unna

description: The ability to see objects in the presence of glare or bright lighting.
description_nb: Følsomhet for gjenskinn betyr evnen til å se klart selv i sterkt lys eller gjenskinn

description: The ability to detect or tell the differences between sounds that vary in pitch and loudness.
description_nb: God hørsel handler om å oppfatte forskjeller i lyder, som tonehøyde og styrke

description: The ability to focus on a single source of sound in the presence of other distracting sounds.
description_nb: Lydmessig oppmerksomhet handler om å kunne fokusere på én lyd selv om det er andre lyder rundt deg

description: The ability to tell the direction from which a sound originated.
description_nb: Lydlokalisering betyr å kunne høre hvor en lyd kommer fra

description: The ability to identify and understand the speech of another person.
description_nb: Talegjenkjenning handler om å forstå hva andre sier

description: The ability to speak clearly so others can understand you.
description_nb: Å snakke klart betyr å uttrykke seg tydelig slik at andre forstår

description: Realistic occupations frequently involve work activities that include practical, hands-on problems and solutions. They often deal with plants, animals, and real-world materials like wood, tools, and machinery. Many of the occupations require working outside, and do not involve a lot of paperwork or working closely with others.
description_nb: Realistiske yrker innebærer ofte arbeidsaktiviteter som omfatter praktiske og konkrete problemer og løsninger. De er ofte knyttet til planter, dyr og konkrete ting som tre, verktøy og maskiner. Mange av yrkene krever at man arbeider utendørs og innebærer ikke særlig mye papirarbeid eller tett samarbeid med andre.

description: Investigative occupations frequently involve working with ideas, and require an extensive amount of thinking. These occupations can involve searching for facts and figuring out problems mentally.
description_nb: Undersøkende yrker innebærer ofte at man jobber med ideer, og de krever omfattende tenkning. Slike yrker kan innebære søk etter fakta og løsing av problemer mentalt.

description: Artistic occupations frequently involve working with forms, designs and patterns. They often require self-expression and the work can be done without following a clear set of rules.
description_nb: Kunstneriske yrker innebærer ofte arbeid med former, design og mønstre. De krever ofte selvutfoldelse, og arbeidet kan gjøres uten å følge et klart sett med regler.

description: Social occupations frequently involve working with, communicating with, and teaching people. These occupations often involve helping or providing service to others.
description_nb: Sosiale yrker innebærer ofte å jobbe med, kommunisere med og lære opp andre mennesker. Slike yrker innebærer ofte å hjelpe eller yte tjenester til andre.

description: Enterprising occupations frequently involve starting up and carrying out projects. These occupations can involve leading people and making many decisions. Sometimes they require risk taking and often deal with business.
description_nb: Foretaksvirksomhet innebærer ofte oppstart og gjennomføring av prosjekter. Slike yrker kan innebære ledelse av andre mennesker og beslutningstaking. Iblant kreves risikotaking, og man har ofte å gjøre med forretningsvirksomhet.

description: Conventional occupations frequently involve following set procedures and routines. These occupations can include working with data and details more than with ideas. Usually there is a clear line of authority to follow.
description_nb: Tradisjonelle yrker innebærer ofte at man følger faste prosedyrer og rutiner. Slike yrker kan omfatte arbeid med data og detaljer snarere enn med ideer. Vanligvis forholder man seg til klare autoritetslinjer.

description: Primary-Rank Descriptiveness
description_nb: Primary-Rank Descriptiveness

description: Secondary-Cutoff/Rank Descriptiveness
description_nb: Secondary-Cutoff/Rank Descriptiveness

description: Tertiary-Cutoff/Rank Descriptiveness
description_nb: Tertiary-Cutoff/Rank Descriptiveness

description: Occupations that satisfy this work value are results oriented and allow employees to use their strongest abilities, giving them a feeling of accomplishment. Corresponding needs are Ability Utilization and Achievement.
description_nb: Tilfredsstillende yrker med hensyn til dette aspektet er resultatorienterte og gir de ansatte muligheten til å bruke sine sterkeste egenskaper, noe som gir dem en følelse av å lykkes. Samsvarende behov er evneutnyttelse og oppnåelse.

description: Occupations that satisfy this work value offer job security and good working conditions. Corresponding needs are Activity, Compensation, Independence, Security, Variety and Working Conditions.
description_nb: Tilfredsstillende yrker med hensyn til dette aspektet gir jobbsikkerhet og gode arbeidsforhold. Samsvarende behov er aktivitet, kompensasjon, uavhengighet, sikkerhet, variasjon og arbeidsforhold.

description: Occupations that satisfy this work value offer advancement, potential for leadership, and are often considered prestigious. Corresponding needs are Advancement, Authority, Recognition and Social Status.
description_nb: Tilfredsstillende yrker med hensyn til dette aspektet gir rom for forfremmelse og potensielle lederstillinger, og betraktes gjerne som statusytrker. Samsvarende behov er forfremmelse, myndighet, anerkjennelse og sosial status.

description: Occupations that satisfy this work value allow employees to provide service to others and work with co-workers in a friendly non-competitive environment. Corresponding needs are Co-workers, Moral Values and Social Service.
description_nb: Tilfredsstillende yrker med hensyn til dette aspektet gir de ansatte mulighet til å yte service til andre og samarbeide med kolleger i et vennlig, ikke-konkurrerende miljø. Samsvarende behov er kolleger, moralske verdier og sosiale tjenester.

description: Occupations that satisfy this work value offer supportive management that stands behind employees. Corresponding needs are Company Policies, Supervision: Human Relations and Supervision: Technical.
description_nb: Tilfredsstillende yrker med hensyn til dette aspektet har en ledelse som støtter og står bak de ansatte. Samsvarende behov er selskapsretningslinjer, tilsyn: mellommenneskelige forhold og tilsyn: teknisk.

description: Occupations that satisfy this work value allow employees to work on their own and make decisions. Corresponding needs are Creativity, Responsibility and Autonomy.
description_nb: Tilfredsstillende yrker med hensyn til dette aspektet gir de ansatte muligheten til å jobbe og ta beslutninger på egenhånd. Samsvarende behov er kreativitet, ansvar og autonomi.

description: Primary-Rank Descriptiveness
description_nb: Primary-Rank Descriptiveness

description: Secondary-Cutoff/Rank Descriptiveness
description_nb: Secondary-Cutoff/Rank Descriptiveness

description: Tertiary-Cutoff/Rank Descriptiveness
description_nb: Tertiary-Cutoff/Rank Descriptiveness

description: Work involves maintaining and repairing of machinery, such as automotive engines, electronic equipment, computers, and communication systems.
Work involves conducting religious worship, leading a church or other religious group, and offering moral guidance associated with beliefs and practices of a religious faith.
Work involves providing personal services to individuals in need of non-medical assistance such as helping arrange or plan for travel, meals, or events.
Work involves providing expert advice, coaching, and counseling on topics such as careers, educational opportunities, and educational and professional development.
Work involves creating strategic plans or taking actions to expand an organization's business or market share.
Work involves selling goods or services.
Work involves promoting or creating a public image for products, services, or organizations to attract interest, engagement, or sales.
Work involves directing and managing financial activities, such as planning and investments for an individual or organization to generate income.
Work involves examining, analyzing, and interpreting accounting records for financial statements, or maintaining, auditing, or evaluating records and accounts.

Work involves recruiting, selecting, and training job applicants, maintaining employee personnel records, administering compensation and employee-benefit programs, and conducting employee performance reviews.
Work involves clerical and administrative tasks for an organization such as answering phones, bookkeeping, updating records, scheduling appointments or meetings, and editing of documents and files.
Work involves planning, directing, or coordinating the daily operations of an organization, and overseeing personnel, business, or administrative services.
Work involves speaking before an audience to educate, entertain, or influence the listeners.
Work involves engaging in political activities to influence government policy.
Work involves studying and applying legal knowledge.
Work involves constructing, installing, or repairing structures and fixtures made of wood.

Work involves driving vehicles, such as vans, trucks, trains, and buses to transport people or materials. Work can also involve operating heavy equipment, such as cranes, forklifts, bulldozers, and backhoes to move materials or earth.
Work involves manually unloading and moving freight, stock, luggage, or other materials, or performing other physical labor.
Work involves maintaining order and protecting life and property by conducting investigations and enforcing laws and regulations to prevent or solve crimes.

Work involves planting, cultivating, and harvesting crops, plants, or trees, or raising farm animals. Work can also involve preparing plant and animal products for distribution to consumers, or protecting natural resources to maximize their use in farming.
Work involves planning, restoring, and conserving natural areas and wildlife habitats.
Work involves feeding, grooming, exercising, or otherwise providing care to promote and maintain the well-being of pets and other animals in settings such as kennels, animal shelters, and zoos.
Work involves training, practicing, or competing in athletic events, or supporting those participating in athletics through coaching, training, or officiating.

Work involves applying science and technology to the design, building, testing, and use of electrical and electronic components, mechanical devices and machines, automotive, marine, and aerospace equipment and vehicles, materials, or structures.
Work involves studying and researching non-living objects, materials, and phenomena through scientific disciplines such as physics, chemistry, astronomy, meteorology, or geology.
Work involves studying and researching living organisms through scientific disciplines such as biology, botany, zoology, microbiology, physiology, biochemistry, or zoology.
Work involves studying and researching the causes, nature, effects, and treatments of disease or other forms of impairment or illness.
Work involves studying and researching human behavior, society, politics, and social relationships through scientific disciplines such as psychology, sociology, economics, or political science.
Work involves studying and researching aspects of human history, culture, and language through disciplines such as history, philosophy, the language arts, or area/ethnic studies.
Work involves developing and applying mathematics and statistical theory and methods.
Work involves designing, developing, testing, and maintaining computer software, hardware, networks, and systems.
Work involves creating original visual artwork for a variety of media and purposes using various techniques and software.
Work involves applying artistic principles to the design and creation of various objects and materials.
Work involves acting as a performer in dance, comedy, or dramatic productions, choreographing of dance performances, or producing of live or recorded entertainment.
Work involves conducting, composing, or playing music or singing.
Work involves developing creative written works, such as novels, scripts, song lyrics, poetry, stories, or advertisements.
Work involves producing, developing, writing, directing, or presenting information through print, radio, television, or digital media.
Work involves preparing, cooking, and presenting food in a distinctive style usually associated with a specific culture or region.
Work involves teaching through lectures, discussions, and demonstrations in one or more subjects.
Work involves providing social services and assistance to improve the well-being and social and psychological functioning of children and adults.
Work involves providing health care services to individuals to include the diagnosis, prevention, or treatment of diseases and other forms of illness or impairment.
Job requires establishing and maintaining personally challenging achievement goals and exerting effort toward mastering tasks.
description_nb: Oppnåelse og innsats handler om å sette seg mål og jobbe hardt for å nå dem

description: Job requires persistence in the face of obstacles.
description_nb: Utholdenhet betyr å holde ut og fortsette selv når ting er vanskelig

description: Job requires a willingness to take on responsibilities and challenges.
description_nb: Initiativ handler om å ta ansvar og starte på oppgaver på egen hånd

description: Job requires a willingness to lead, take charge, and offer opinions and direction.
description_nb: Ledelse betyr å ta ansvar, veilede andre og hjelpe dem til å nå sine mål

description: Job requires being pleasant with others on the job and displaying a good-natured, cooperative attitude.
description_nb: Samarbeid handler om å jobbe godt sammen med andre for å nå et felles mål

description: Job requires being sensitive to others' needs and feelings and being understanding and helpful on the job.
description_nb: Omtanke for andre handler om å være forståelsesfull og hjelpe mennesker som trenger det

description: Job requires preferring to work with others rather than alone, and being personally connected with others on the job.
description_nb: Sosial legning betyr at du liker å jobbe med andre og skape gode relasjoner på jobb

description: Job requires maintaining composure, keeping emotions in check, controlling anger, and avoiding aggressive behavior, even in very difficult situations.
description_nb: Selvkontroll handler om å holde roen, styre følelsene og unngå aggressiv oppførsel, selv i vanskelige situasjoner

description: Job requires accepting criticism and dealing calmly and effectively with high stress situations.
description_nb: Stressmestring betyr å takle press og holde roen i situasjoner med mye stress

description: Job requires being open to change (positive or negative) and to considerable variety in the workplace.
description_nb: Tilpasningsdyktighet handler om å være åpen for endringer og takle variasjon i arbeidsoppgaver

description: Job requires being reliable, responsible, and dependable, and fulfilling obligations.
description_nb: Ansvarlighet handler om å være pålitelig og sørge for at oppgaver blir gjort som avtalt

description: Job requires being careful about detail and thorough in completing work tasks.
description_nb: Øye for detaljer betyr å være nøye og grundig i arbeidet

description: Job requires being honest and ethical.
description_nb: Integritet handler om å være ærlig og opptre etisk i alt du gjør

description: Job requires developing one's own ways of doing things, guiding oneself with little or no supervision, and depending on oneself to get things done.
description_nb: Uavhengighet betyr å jobbe selvstendig og finne egne løsninger uten mye tilsyn

description: Job requires creativity and alternative thinking to develop new ideas for and answers to work-related problems.
description_nb: Innovasjon handler om å være kreativ og finne nye løsninger på problemer

description: Job requires analyzing information and using logic to address work-related issues and problems.
description_nb: Analytisk tenking handler om å bruke logikk og analysere informasjon for å løse problemer

description: Understanding written sentences and paragraphs in work related documents.
description_nb: Leseforståelse betyr å kunne lese og forstå skriftlig informasjon, som rapporter og dokumente

description: Giving full attention to what other people are saying, taking time to understand the points being made, asking questions as appropriate, and not interrupting at inappropriate times.
description_nb: Aktiv lytting handler om å lytte nøye, stille spørsmål og vise at du forstår det som blir sagt

description: Communicating effectively in writing as appropriate for the needs of the audience.
description_nb: Skriving betyr å kommunisere klart og effektivt gjennom tekst, tilpasset leseren

description: Talking to others to convey information effectively.
description_nb: Snakking handler om å formidle informasjon klart og effektivt til andre

description: Using mathematics to solve problems.
description_nb: Matematikk handler om å bruke tall og formler for å løse problemer

description: Using scientific rules and methods to solve problems.
description_nb: Naturvitenskap handler om å bruke regler og metoder for å forstå og løse problemer

description: Using logic and reasoning to identify the strengths and weaknesses of alternative solutions, conclusions or approaches to problems.
description_nb: Kritisk tenkning betyr å bruke logikk for å vurdere styrker og svakheter i ulike løsninger

description: Understanding the implications of new information for both current and future problem-solving and decision-making.
description_nb: Analytisk tenkning handler om å forstå ny informasjon og bruke den til å løse problemer

description: Selecting and using training/instructional methods and procedures appropriate for the situation when learning or teaching new things.
description_nb: Læringsstrategier handler om å velge metoder som gjør det lettere å lære eller lære bort noe nytt

description: Monitoring/Assessing performance of yourself, other individuals, or organizations to make improvements or take corrective action.
description_nb: Vurdering og evaluering handler om å følge med på hvordan du selv eller andre presterer for å gjøre forbedringer

description: Being aware of others' reactions and understanding why they react as they do.
description_nb: Sosiale ferdigheter betyr å forstå andres følelser og reaksjoner

description: Adjusting actions in relation to others' actions.
description_nb: Sosial tilpasningsevne handler om å justere egne handlinger for å samarbeide bedre med andre

description: Persuading others to change their minds or behavior.
description_nb: Overtalelsesevne betyr å få andre til å endre mening eller endre handlinger

description: Bringing others together and trying to reconcile differences.
description_nb: Forhandlingsevne handler om å finne løsninger som alle kan være enige om

description: Teaching others how to do something.
description_nb: Instruksjon handler om å lære andre hvordan de skal gjøre noe

description: Actively looking for ways to help people.
description_nb: Serviceinnstilling betyr å lete etter måter å hjelpe andre mennesker på

description: Identifying complex problems and reviewing related information to develop and evaluate options and implement solutions.
description_nb: Problemløsning handler om å forstå komplekse problemer og finne gode løsninger

description: Analyzing needs and product requirements to create a design.
description_nb: Operasjonsanalyse handler om å vurdere behov og krav for å lage et design

description: Generating or adapting equipment and technology to serve user needs.
description_nb: Teknologidesign betyr å tilpasse utstyr og teknologi til brukernes behov

description: Determining the kind of tools and equipment needed to do a job.
description_nb: Utstyrsvalg handler om å velge riktig verktøy og utstyr til jobben

description: Installing equipment, machines, wiring, or programs to meet specifications.
description_nb: Installasjon betyr å sette opp utstyr, maskiner eller ledninger etter spesifikasjoner

description: Writing computer programs for various purposes.
description_nb: Programmering handler om å lage dataprogrammer for ulike formål

description: Watching gauges, dials, or other indicators to make sure a machine is working properly.
description_nb: Driftsovervåking betyr å sjekke at maskiner fungerer som de skal

description: Controlling operations of equipment or systems.
description_nb: Drift og styring handler om å kontrollere utstyr eller systemer

description: Performing routine maintenance on equipment and determining when and what kind of maintenance is needed.
description_nb: Utstyrsvedlikehold handler om å passe på at maskiner og verktøy fungerer som de skal

description: Determining causes of operating errors and deciding what to do about it.
description_nb: Feilsøking betyr å finne ut hvorfor noe ikke fungerer og hva som må gjøres for å fikse det

description: Repairing machines or systems using the needed tools.
description_nb: Reparasjon handler om å fikse maskiner eller systemer ved hjelp av riktig verktøy

description: Conducting tests and inspections of products, services, or processes to evaluate quality or performance.
description_nb: Kvalitetskontrollanalyse betyr å teste produkter eller tjenester for å sikre god kvalitet

description: Considering the relative costs and benefits of potential actions to choose the most appropriate one.
description_nb: Dette handler om å veie fordeler og ulemper for å ta gode valg

description: Determining how a system should work and how changes in conditions, operations, and the environment will affect outcomes.
description_nb: Systemanalyse betyr å forstå hvordan et system fungerer og hva som kan forbedres

description: Identifying measures or indicators of system performance and the actions needed to improve or correct performance, relative to the goals of the system.
description_nb: Systemevaluering handler om å vurdere hvordan et system oppfyller målene sine

description: Managing one's own time and the time of others.
description_nb: Tidsstyring betyr å planlegge tiden godt for deg selv og andre

description: Determining how money will be spent to get the work done, and accounting for these expenditures.
description_nb: Økonomistyring handler om å planlegge hvordan penger brukes på en smart måte

description: Obtaining and seeing to the appropriate use of equipment, facilities, and materials needed to do certain work.
description_nb: Materialforvaltning betyr å sørge for at utstyr og materialer blir brukt riktig

description: Motivating, developing, and directing people as they work, identifying the best people for the job.
description_nb: Personaladministrasjon handler om å motivere, utvikle og finne de rette menneskene til en jobb

description: Knowledge of business and management principles involved in strategic planning, resource allocation, human resources modeling, leadership technique, production methods, and coordination of people and resources.
description_nb: Administrasjon og ledelse handler om å planlegge, organisere og lede mennesker og ressurser for å nå mål

description: Knowledge of administrative and clerical procedures and systems such as word processing, managing files and records, stenography and transcription, designing forms, and other office procedures and terminology.
description_nb: Kontorarbeid handler om å bruke systemer og digitale verktøy for å holde orden på informasjon

description: Knowledge of economic and accounting principles and practices, the financial markets, banking and the analysis and reporting of financial data.
description_nb: Økonomi og regnskap handler om å holde oversikt over inntekter, utgifter og lage økonomiske rapporter

description: Knowledge of principles and methods for showing, promoting, and selling products or services. This includes marketing strategy and tactics, product demonstration, sales techniques, and sales control systems.
description_nb: Salg og markedsføring handler om å vise frem produkter eller tjenester for å få folk interessert i dem

description: Knowledge of principles and processes for providing customer and personal services. This includes customer needs assessment, meeting quality standards for services, and evaluation of customer satisfaction.
description_nb: Kundeservice handler om å hjelpe kunder med det de trenger, slik at de blir fornøyde

description: Knowledge of principles and procedures for personnel recruitment, selection, training, compensation and benefits, labor relations and negotiation, and personnel information systems.
description_nb: Personalledelse og HR handler om å rekruttere, utvikle og støtte ansatte i en bedrift

description: Knowledge of principles and methods for moving people or goods by air, rail, sea, or road, including the relative costs and benefits.
description_nb: Transport og logistikk handler om å planlegge hvordan varer eller mennesker skal komme dit de skal

description: Knowledge of raw materials, production processes, quality control, costs, and other techniques for maximizing the effective manufacture and distribution of goods.
description_nb: Industriell produksjon handler om å lage produkter på en effektiv måte, fra råvarer til ferdige varer

description: Knowledge of techniques and equipment for planting, growing, and harvesting food products (both plant and animal) for consumption, including storage/handling techniques.
description_nb: Matproduksjon handler om å lage matvarer, fra dyrking til ferdige produkter

description: Knowledge of circuit boards, processors, chips, electronic equipment, and computer hardware and software, including applications and programming.
description_nb: Datamaskiner og elektronikk handler om hvordan teknologi som kretskort, databrikker og programmering fungerer

description: Knowledge of the practical application of engineering science and technology. This includes applying principles, techniques, procedures, and equipment to the design and production of various goods and services.
description_nb: Ingeniørfag og teknologi handler om å bruke kunnskap til å lage løsninger, produkter eller tjenester

description: Knowledge of design techniques, tools, and principles involved in production of precision technical plans, blueprints, drawings, and models.
description_nb: Teknisk design handler om å lage nøyaktige tegninger og modeller for ulike produkter

description: Knowledge of materials, methods, and the tools involved in the construction or repair of houses, buildings, or other structures such as highways and roads.
description_nb: Bygg og anlegg handler om å bygge, reparere eller vedlikeholde hus, veier eller andre strukturer

description: Knowledge of machines and tools, including their designs, uses, repair, and maintenance.
description_nb: Mekanikk handler om hvordan maskiner fungerer, og hvordan de brukes, repareres og vedlikeholdes

description: Knowledge of arithmetic, algebra, geometry, calculus, statistics, and their applications.
description_nb: Matematikk handler om tall, formler og hvordan vi kan bruke dem til å løse problemer

description: Knowledge and prediction of physical principles, laws, their interrelationships, and applications to understanding fluid, material, and atmospheric dynamics, and mechanical, electrical, atomic and sub- atomic structures and processes.
description_nb: Fysikk handler om hvordan verden fungerer, fra lover i naturen til mekanikk og energi

description: Knowledge of the chemical composition, structure, and properties of substances and of the chemical processes and transformations that they undergo. This includes uses of chemicals and their interactions, danger signs, production techniques, and disposal methods.
description_nb: Kjemi handler om stoffers egenskaper, hvordan de reagerer med hverandre, og hva vi kan bruke dem til

description: Knowledge of plant and animal organisms, their tissues, cells, functions, interdependencies, and interactions with each other and the environment.
description_nb: Biologi handler om livet på jorden, fra planter til dyr og mennesker

description: Knowledge of human behavior and performance; individual differences in ability, personality, and interests; learning and motivation; psychological research methods; and the assessment and treatment of behavioral and affective disorders.
description_nb: Psykologi handler om hvorfor mennesker tenker, føler og oppfører seg som de gjør

description: Knowledge of group behavior and dynamics, societal trends and influences, human migrations, ethnicity, cultures and their history and origins.
description_nb: Sosiologi og sosialantropologi handler om å forstå hvordan mennesker lever sammen, og hvordan samfunn og kulturer utvikler seg

description: Knowledge of principles and methods for describing the features of land, sea, and air masses, including their physical characteristics, locations, interrelationships, and distribution of plant, animal, and human life.
description_nb: Geografi handler om å lære om steder, natur, mennesker og hvordan de påvirker hverandre

description: Knowledge of the information and techniques needed to diagnose and treat human injuries, diseases, and deformities. This includes symptoms, treatment alternatives, drug properties and interactions, and preventive health-care measures.
description_nb: Helse handler om å forebygge sykdom og ta vare på kropp og sinn

description: Knowledge of principles, methods, and procedures for diagnosis, treatment, and rehabilitation of physical and mental dysfunctions, and for career counseling and guidance.
description_nb: Terapi handler om å hjelpe mennesker med fysiske eller psykiske utfordringer gjennom behandling og støtte

description: Knowledge of principles and methods for curriculum and training design, teaching and instruction for individuals and groups, and the measurement of training effects.
description_nb: Undervisning og pedagogikk handler om å lære bort kunnskap på en måte som hjelper andre til å forstå

description: Knowledge of the structure and content of the English language including the meaning and spelling of words, rules of composition, and grammar.
description_nb: Språkkunnskaper handler om å forstå ord, setninger og grammatikk i norsk språk

description: Knowledge of the structure and content of a foreign (non-English) language including the meaning and spelling of words, rules of composition and grammar, and pronunciation.
description_nb: Fremmedspråk handler om å lære nye språk for å kunne kommunisere med mennesker fra andre land

description: Knowledge of the theory and techniques required to compose, produce, and perform works of music, dance, visual arts, drama, and sculpture.
description_nb: Kunst, musikk og dans handler om kreativitet, uttrykk og skaperglede gjennom ulike former for kunst

description: Knowledge of historical events and their causes, indicators, and effects on civilizations and cultures.
description_nb: Historie handler om å forstå fortiden, hva som har skjedd, og hvorfor det er viktig i dag

description: Knowledge of different philosophical systems and religions. This includes their basic principles, values, ethics, ways of thinking, customs, practices, and their impact on human culture.
description_nb: Filosofi, etikk og religion handler om hvordan vi tenker, hva vi tror på, og hva som er riktig eller galt

description: Knowledge of relevant equipment, policies, procedures, and strategies to promote effective local, state, or national security operations for the protection of people, data, property, and institutions.
description_nb: Samfunnssikkerhet handler om å beskytte mennesker, data og eiendom gjennom gode sikkerhetstiltak

description: Knowledge of laws, legal codes, court procedures, precedents, government regulations, executive orders, agency rules, and the democratic political process.
description_nb: Lov og rett handler om lover, regler og rettferdighet i samfunnet

description: Knowledge of transmission, broadcasting, switching, control, and operation of telecommunications systems.
description_nb: Kommunikasjonsteknologi handler om hvordan vi sender og mottar informasjon gjennom teknologiske systemer

description: Knowledge of media production, communication, and dissemination techniques and methods. This includes alternative ways to inform and entertain via written, oral, and visual media.
description_nb: Medier og kommunikasjon handler om å lage og dele informasjon gjennom ulike kanaler

description: Observing, receiving, and otherwise obtaining information from all relevant sources.
description_nb: Informasjonssøk handler om å finne og samle inn nyttig informasjon fra ulike kilder

element_name_nb: Overvåking av prosesser materialer og omgivelser
description: Monitoring and reviewing information from materials, events, or the environment, to detect or assess problems.
description_nb: Overvåking handler om å følge med på hva som skjer for å oppdage problemer eller endringer

element_name_nb: Identifisering av objekter, handlinger og hendelser
description: Identifying information by categorizing, estimating, recognizing differences or similarities, and detecting changes in circumstances or events.
description_nb: Handler om å kjenne igjen ting, forskjeller eller endringer i situasjoner

element_name_nb: Inspeksjon av utstyr, strukturer eller materialer
description: Inspecting equipment, structures, or materials to identify the cause of errors or other problems or defects.
description_nb: Inspeksjon handler om å sjekke utstyr eller materialer for feil eller mangler

element_name: Estimating the Quantifiable Characteristics of Products, Events, or Information
element_name_nb: Estimering av kvantitative egenskaper ved produkter, hendelser eller informasjon
description: Estimating sizes, distances, and quantities; or determining time, costs, resources, or materials needed to perform a work activity.
description_nb: Dette handler om å beregne størrelser, mengder eller kostnader for oppgaver eller produkter

element_name: Judging the Qualities of Objects, Services, or People
element_name_nb: Vurdere kvalitet på gjenstander, tjenester eller mennesker
description: Assessing the value, importance, or quality of things or people.
description_nb: Dette handler om å bedømme verdien eller kvaliteten på ting, tjenester eller personer

description: Compiling, coding, categorizing, calculating, tabulating, auditing, or verifying information or data.
description_nb: Informasjonsbehandling handler om å samle, organisere og analysere informasjon eller data

element_name: Evaluating Information to Determine Compliance with Standards
element_name_nb: Vurdere informasjon for å avgjøre samsvar regler og standarder
description: Using relevant information and individual judgment to determine whether events or processes comply with laws, regulations, or standards.
description_nb: Å vurdere informasjon innebærer å sjekke om noe følger regler og standarder

description: Identifying the underlying principles, reasons, or facts of information by breaking down information or data into separate parts.
description_nb: Å analysere data betyr å finne mønstre eller forstå fakta ved å dele opp informasjon i mindre deler

description: Analyzing information and evaluating results to choose the best solution and solve problems.
description_nb: Handler om å finne gode løsninger og ta riktige valg når problemer oppstår

description: Developing, designing, or creating new applications, ideas, relationships, systems, or products, including artistic contributions.
description_nb: Kreativ tenking handler om å komme opp med nye ideer eller løsninger på utfordringer

description: Keeping up-to-date technically and applying new knowledge to your job.
description_nb: Handler om å lære nye ting og bruke dem i arbeid eller oppgaver

description: Establishing long-range objectives and specifying the strategies and actions to achieve them.
description_nb: Å fastsette mål handler om å planlegge hva man vil oppnå og hvordan man skal gjøre det

description: Scheduling events, programs, and activities, as well as the work of others.
description_nb: Handler om å organisere oppgaver, hendelser eller prosjekter på en effektiv måte

description: Developing specific goals and plans to prioritize, organize, and accomplish your work.
description_nb: Å organisere betyr å sette opp en plan for hva som må gjøres først, og hvordan det skal gjøres

description: Performing physical activities that require considerable use of your arms and legs and moving your whole body, such as climbing, lifting, balancing, walking, stooping, and handling of materials.
description_nb: Handler om å bruke kroppen aktivt, for eksempel ved løfting, klatring eller turgåing

description: Using hands and arms in handling, installing, positioning, and moving materials, and manipulating things.
description_nb: Å håndtere og flytte gjenstander betyr å bruke hender og armer for å løfte, plassere eller flytte ting

description: Using either control mechanisms or direct physical activity to operate machines or processes (not including computers or vehicles).
description_nb: Handler om å bruke maskiner eller mekanismer for å styre ulike prosesser

element_name: Operating Vehicles, Mechanized Devices, or Equipment
description: Running, maneuvering, navigating, or driving vehicles or mechanized equipment, such as forklifts, passenger vehicles, aircraft, or water craft.
description_nb: Å bruke kjøretøy eller mekanisk utstyr innebærer å kjøre eller manøvrere maskiner som biler, trucker eller båter

description: Using computers and computer systems (including hardware and software) to program, write software, set up functions, enter data, or process information.
description_nb: Handler om å bruke dataprogrammer til å skrive, analysere eller behandle informasjon

element_name: Drafting, Laying Out, and Specifying Technical Devices, Parts, and Equipment
element_name_nb: Skisse eller spesifisere tekniske enheter, deler og utstyr
description: Providing documentation, detailed instructions, drawings, or specifications to tell others about how devices, parts, equipment, or structures are to be fabricated, constructed, assembled, modified, maintained, or used.
description_nb: Handler om å lage tegninger eller beskrivelser for hvordan teknisk utstyr skal lages eller brukes

description: Servicing, repairing, adjusting, and testing machines, devices, moving parts, and equipment that operate primarily on the basis of mechanical (not electronic) principles.
description_nb: Å reparere mekanisk utstyr handler om å fikse eller justere maskiner som beveger seg med mekaniske prinsipper

description: Servicing, repairing, calibrating, regulating, fine-tuning, or testing machines, devices, and equipment that operate primarily on the basis of electrical or electronic (not mechanical) principles.
description_nb: Handler om å reparere eller justere elektroniske apparater ved hjelp av elektriske prinsipper

description: Entering, transcribing, recording, storing, or maintaining information in written or electronic/magnetic form.
description_nb: Å dokumentere informasjon betyr å skrive ned, lagre eller organisere data på en systematisk måte

element_name: Interpreting the Meaning of Information for Others
element_name_nb: Tolke hvilken mening informasjon har for andre
description: Translating or explaining what information means and how it can be used.
description_nb: Handler om å oversette eller forklare hva informasjon betyr, og hvordan den kan brukes

element_name: Communicating with Supervisors, Peers, or Subordinates
description: Providing information to supervisors, co-workers, and subordinates by telephone, in written form, e-mail, or in person.
description_nb: Handler om å dele informasjon med kollegaer eller ledelse gjennom møter, e-post eller samtaler

element_name: Communicating with People Outside the Organization
description: Communicating with people outside the organization, representing the organization to customers, the public, government, and other external sources. This information can be exchanged in person, in writing, or by telephone or e-mail.
description_nb: Handler om å snakke med kunder, myndigheter eller andre aktører utenfor organisasjonen, enten ansikt til ansikt, via telefon eller e-post

description: Developing constructive and cooperative working relationships with others, and maintaining them over time.
description_nb: Handler om å bygge gode relasjoner med andre og sørge for at de varer over tid

element_name_nb: Gi omsorg og assistanse til andre
description: Providing personal assistance, medical attention, emotional support, or other personal care to others such as coworkers, customers, or patients.
description_nb: Å gi omsorg og assistanse handler om å hjelpe andre med personlig støtte, pleie eller praktisk hjelp

description: Convincing others to buy merchandise/goods or to otherwise change their minds or actions.
description_nb: Overbevise andre til å kjøpe varer/produkter eller på annen måte få de til å endre mening eller handlinger

element_name: Resolving Conflicts and Negotiating with Others
element_name_nb: Løse konflikter og forhandle med andre
description: Handling complaints, settling disputes, and resolving grievances and conflicts, or otherwise negotiating with others.
description_nb: Handler om å håndtere uenigheter og finne løsninger som fungerer for alle parter

element_name: Performing for or Working Directly with the Public
description: Performing for people or dealing directly with the public. This includes serving customers in restaurants and stores, and receiving clients or guests.
description_nb: Handler om å jobbe direkte med mennesker, enten på en scene, i en butikk eller i kundeservice

element_name: Coordinating the Work and Activities of Others
description: Getting members of a group to work together to accomplish tasks.
description_nb: Å koordinere betyr å sørge for at flere personer jobber sammen for å nå et felles mål

description: Encouraging and building mutual trust, respect, and cooperation among team members.
description_nb: Handler om å skape tillit, samarbeid og gode relasjoner mellom medlemmer av et team

description: Identifying the educational needs of others, developing formal educational or training programs or classes, and teaching or instructing others.
description_nb: Å lære opp andre betyr å dele kunnskap, planlegge kurs eller veilede noen i nye ferdigheter

description: Providing guidance and direction to subordinates, including setting performance standards and monitoring performance.
description_nb: Dette innebærer å gi råd, sette mål og inspirere ansatte til å gjøre sitt beste på jobb

description: Identifying the developmental needs of others and coaching, mentoring, or otherwise helping others to improve their knowledge or skills.
description_nb: Å trene og utvikle andre handler om å hjelpe dem med å lære nye ferdigheter og bli bedre i det de gjør

element_name: Providing Consultation and Advice to Others
description: Providing guidance and expert advice to management or other groups on technical, systems-, or process-related topics.
description_nb: Rådgivning til andre handler om å gi råd og veiledning til grupper eller enkeltpersoner om tekniske eller praktiske temaer

description: Performing day-to-day administrative tasks such as maintaining information files and processing paperwork.
description_nb: Å utføre administrative oppgaver innebærer å holde orden på dokumenter, informasjon og daglige rutiner

description: Recruiting, interviewing, selecting, hiring, and promoting employees in an organization.
description_nb: Handler om å rekruttere, ansette og utvikle ansatte for en organisasjon

description: Monitoring and controlling resources and overseeing the spending of money.
description_nb: Å overvåke ressurser betyr å holde oversikt over penger, utstyr eller andre verdier for å sikre riktig bruk
